publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-330 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Establishment of Committee-That the Parliament agrees to establish a committee of the Parliament as follows: Name of Committee: Stirling-Alloa-Kincardine Railway and Linked Improvements Bill Remit: To consider and report to the Parliament on the Stirling-Alloa-Kincardine Railway and Linked Improvements Bill Duration: Until the Bill has received Royal Assent, falls or is withdrawn Convenership: The Convener will be a member of the Labour Party and the Deputy Convener a member of the Scottish National Party Membership: Bill Butler (Labour), Mr Richard Baker (Labour), Mr Rob Gibson (SNP), David Mundell (Conservative), Nora Radcliffe (Lib Dem) Supported by: Tavish Scott*
